    • Method Detail

      • createProperties

        protected static void createProperties(Object owner,
                                       Class<?> c,
                                       BeanInfo info,
                                       Property parent,
                                       Vector<Property> vProperties,
                                       ComponentFactory.Policy policy)
        Initialize a vector of properties for the specified object instance (owner) or object class (c).
        Parameters:
        owner - the properties owner. If null, then new instance of the specified class c will be created
        c - the object class
        info - BeanInfo for the specified object. If null, then bean info will be got through the Introspector.
        parent - the property parent
        vProperties - vector where properties will be added.
        PENDING:
        medium 1) There is possible deep nesting of properties. We can restrict the nesting level by some value, for example 20. But should we do it? At the moment we are just ignoring this issue to optimise the output., medium 2) This is a BIG question what should we do when this excptions is thrown. At the moment we are just ignoring them. The other question - should we distinguish the exception subtypes:
        • InstantiationException
        • IllegalAccessException
        Currently we cath all Throwable exceptions and log it in log4j.DEBUG category.

      • createProperty

        protected static Property createProperty(Class<?> type,
                                         Object owner,
                                         PropertyDescriptor descriptor,
                                         Property parent,
                                         ComponentFactory.Policy policy)
                                  throws IntrospectionException
        Throws:
        IntrospectionException
        TODO:
        medium comments and docs
        PENDING:
        high #1 type definition. Currently type is defined through descriptor.getPropertyType(). But we have a problem when a property value is type subclass with other subproperties. So we need to get type of property value. Possible we need to check type every time, when property value is changed and rebuild its model if the type is changed.

      • derivePropertyType

        protected static Class<?> derivePropertyType(Object owner,
                                             PropertyDescriptor descr)
        This method is used to detect real class of the property when property is declared as returng an interface. We try to get a class from the instance of the property and use it rather than that declared in PropertyDescriptor

      • merge

        protected static PropertyDescriptor merge(BeanDescriptor beanDescriptor,
                                          PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor,
                                          boolean isDynamic)
        Merges information from PropertyDescriptor and BeanDescriptor.

        See the document for details.

        PENDING:
        high meriging for attributes that are Methods are meningless because method belong to the different class than that associated with BeanDescriptor. We need some graceful solutions for this. Perhaps methods should be replaced with some delegates - anonymous classes
